original_text:
The righteous care for the needs of their animals,
    but the kindest acts of the wicked are cruel.
korean_text: 의인은 자기의 가축의 생명을 돌보나 악인의 긍휼은 잔인이니라

sentences.original_text: The righteous care for the needs of their animals
but the kindest acts of the wicked are cruel
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 악인의 가장 친절한 행동도 잔인합니다
